title: Project Initialization & Dependencies
description: Initialize the macOS Swift project. Configure 'k2-fsa/sherpa-onnx' (v1.9.0+) dependency via Swift Package Manager. Ensure the target platform is macOS 14+.

title: Audio Engine Implementation
description: Implement 'AudioInputManager' using 'AVAudioEngine'. Set up the input node tap and use vDSP (Accelerate framework) to handle efficient sample rate conversion (Hardware -> 16kHz).

title: VAD Service Implementation
description: Implement 'VADService' using Silero VAD v5 (ONNX). Implement sliding window logic: Start trigger (prob > 0.5 for ~90ms) and End trigger (prob < 0.3 for 700ms, extending to 1.5s for connector words).

title: Transcription Service Core
description: Implement 'Transcriber' service. Load 'moonshine-tiny-en-int8.onnx' model on launch. Implement 'transcribe(buffer: [Float]) -> String' on a high-priority background Task.

title: Console Verification Loop
description: Connect Mic -> VAD -> Transcriber. Verify that speaking 'Testing 1 2 3' logs the correct text to the Xcode console within 300ms.

title: GhostPill UI Component
description: Build the 'GhostPill' SwiftUI view. Implement animations for 'listening' (pulsing) and 'processing' states.

title: Overlay Window Manager
description: Implement 'OverlayWindow' as an 'NSPanel' subclass (borderless, non-activating, floating level, clear background) to host the GhostPill.

title: Cursor Position Tracking
description: Implement 'AccessibilityManager' logic to query 'kAXFocusedUIElementAttribute' and 'kAXPositionAttribute' to position the GhostPill near the user's caret.

title: Real-time UI Data Binding
description: Wire the 'Transcriber' partial results to the 'GhostPill' view state. Ensure text updates in real-time (Gray text) as the user speaks.

title: Text Injection (Primary Method)
description: Implement logic to insert text directly into the focused element using 'AXUIElementSetAttributeValue' with 'kAXSelectedTextAttribute'.

title: Text Injection (Pasteboard Fallback)
description: Implement fallback injection: Save current clipboard -> Copy text -> Simulate Cmd+V (CGEvent) -> Restore old clipboard (async).

title: Permissions & Onboarding
description: Implement a user-friendly onboarding flow to request Microphone access and Accessibility permissions (TCC).

title: Context Formatting
description: Add post-processing logic or system prompts (if supported) to handle auto-capitalization and punctuation.

title: Audio Feedback
description: Implement subtle sound effects ('pop') for start and stop listening events.

title: Menu Bar Settings
description: Create a Menu Bar status item. Add settings to switch between Moonshine Tiny and Base models.
